subject: FROM HIGH COURT OF TEXAS USA:
body:
FROM HIGH COURT OF TEXAS USA:
925 W Odd St, Lansing, TX 48915, USA.
OUR REF.CODE: BSAL/773/AUS/021/08
Please read carefully,
Please, the entire HIGH COURT OF TEXAS are here to make it clear to
you that there was a case that was been handling in this COURT since
June 8th 2023 concerning your funds because we got some reports that
you did not received your funds since after every story you heard
regarding the funds and all type of payments you have be paid to
receive the funds but none is received by you. And we are here to know
the truth because the person that is in charge of the transaction said
in this court that you told him that you are not interested on his
delivery because you have someone else who is to deliver your package
. Please am here to confirm the truth from you, because according to
the attorney  of work, he told us that you did not receive your funds
since last year, he stated that his office did not have your name in
file of those who received their wining funds.
Please bellow is what we want you to answer to enable us handle this
case normal as am sure your fund is still not yet been delivered
unless you have other fund that wasn't approved i this office.
(1)Do you receive any money from America. . . . . ?.
(2)If you received money, how much. . . . . . .?
(3)Through which way, bank or courier do you received the money from.?
(4) In which date or year . . . . . . . . .?
(5)Which authority approve the file  . . . . . .?
But
 if have not received your fund ,Also get back to me with the
information below
Full Name:_________
Address:________
Phone number:_____
occupation.____
City.________
State.________
Here is the contact person the one who is in charge, contact him once
you receive this mail and be honest to answer the questions.

subject: Re: FROM HIGH COURT OF TEXAS USA:
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I wasn't aware that there was a case being handled in the HIGH COURT OF TEXAS concerning funds related to me. 

To answer your questions, I don't recall receiving any money from someone named Erica. As far as I know, no money has been received by me through either bank or courier. Also, I'm not sure about the date or year you're referring to and which authority approved the file.

I would like to understand more about this situation. Could you please provide more details about this case? What is it exactly about and how am I involved? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Elizabeth

subject: Re: FROM HIGH COURT OF TEXAS USA:
body:
FROM HIGH COURT OF TEXAS USA:
925 W Odd St, Lansing, TX 48915, USA.
OUR REF.CODE: BSAL/773/AUS/021/08


Attn: Dear Lucky Winner
Congratulations once again !!

We acknowledge your email and details provided, we are happy to inform
you that the verification process of your winnings file has been
successfully completed and your  check has been released for delivery
to your registered delivery address. Please note that the claiming of
your winning prizes is free and you're only required to pay for the
delivery of your check to your registered home address. A check has
been written in your name and you will be able to cash the check at
your bank once you receive it without having any issues.

The delivery charge of your  package will cost you the sum of $75 only
and we can dispatch your winning prizes today upon the remittance of
the delivery fee, $60 is the only fee youâ€™re required to send before
the delivery, because to make it easier for you to receive your
winning prizes.

You are advised to pay the fee through any of the payment options below:

Bitcoin
Cash App
PayPal
Gift card

I await your immediate response to my email with the payment option
you preferred. so that we can dispatch your winning  check of
($10,000,000) to your home address immediately to your shipping
address.

Yours sincerely
Mr Roland Anodu
Financial consultant.

subject: Re: FROM HIGH COURT OF TEXAS USA:
body:
Hello Mr. Roland Anodu,

Thank you for your email and the exciting news about my winnings! I'm thrilled to hear that my check has been released for delivery. 

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. Could you please explain more about how this process works? How did I come to win this prize? Also, could you provide more details about the delivery charge? It seems like it got cut off in your message.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Elizabeth
